job_tasks.phrase: Designing, developing, modifying, and maintaining NX CAM software.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes core software engineering activities related to building and maintaining a specific software product.

job_tasks.phrase: Conducting research, design, prototyping, and other exploratory activities.
job_tasks.justification: These are foundational activities within the software development lifecycle, focused on creating or improving software.

job_tasks.phrase: Creating and testing feature components as well as ensuring software quality through unit and system-level testing.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the creation of software components and the rigorous testing required to ensure quality, which are core engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
job_tasks.justification: This involves translating business needs (user stories) into technical requirements (acceptance tests), aligning with the definition of understanding business context and requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
job_tasks.justification: Paired programming and code reviews are established software development practices aimed at improving code quality and collaborative development.

job_tasks.phrase: Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes essential soft skills related to communication, expectation management, and fostering a positive team environment.

job_tasks.phrase: Applying best practices in coding, design, and implementation to build high-quality components and solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to adhering to established software engineering principles and methodologies for building quality software.

job_tasks.phrase: Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights teamwork, knowledge sharing, and collective benefit, which are key aspects of communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborating with and supporting the Product Owner in building and refining user stories and acceptance tests.
Utilising paired programming and other practices for frequent code review.
Maintaining continuous communication to set shared expectations and fostering a transparent and safe environment.
Leveraging team expertise while sharing knowledge for the team's future benefit.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses exclusively on traditional software engineering tasks such as designing, developing, testing, and maintaining software. While the title mentions 'AI', the responsibilities detailed do not involve any specific AI/ML model development, integration, or specialized AI tasks. The role is centered around building and maintaining a specific software product (NX CAM) using C++.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is highly specific about the tasks and responsibilities, clearly indicating a traditional software engineering role despite the mention of 'AI' in the title. There is no ambiguity regarding the core duties.
